parse
err 'cannot reference auth handler svc.MyAuth from another package'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"
)

//encore:api public
func Foo(context.Context) error { return nil }


-- svc/svc_test.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"
    "testing"

    "encore.dev/et"
)

func TestFoo(t *testing.T) {
    et.AuthHandler(MyAuth)
}
